p.k: The Empire of mid-South" is a remarkable film with rare archive footage of the first steps of the colonisation of French Indochina to the fall of Saigon after the American Army left Vietnam. Jacques Perrin reads out passages from Vietnamese, French and American writings giving a transcription of the history of Vietnam as an epic tale. The archives, coming from both professionals and amateurs, have been collected for over 10 years by Galat√©e Films to offer a unique visual animated overview of the fascinating and painful Vietnamese history.
